entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11 except minus 16 in the Natuashish area. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11 except minus 16 in the Natuashish area. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 21. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:30 PM ADT Saturday 18 March 2023
